team.name: Silas Thorne
team.prompt_template: Situation: {situation}.  Provide a single, concise strategic assessment of the situation, focusing on the most immediate threats and opportunities. Max 75 tokens.

team.name: Zara Volkov
team.prompt_template: Situation: {situation}. Describe the immediate combat event in 30-40 words. Focus on key actions and tactical implications.

team.name: Ben Carter
team.prompt_template: Situation: {situation}.  Report the primary movement of the tribute(s) in 15-20 words.  Identify any significant changes in district dynamics.
